result.html: Tá an páiste ag rithThe child is running.
result.ponchtml: Tá an páiste ag riṫThe child is running.

result.html: Tá an t-am ag imeachtTime is running out.

result.eng: The buses are running late again.
result.ga: Tá moill ar na busanna arís
result.orig: Tá moill ar na busanna arís
result.html: Tá moill ar na busanna arísThe buses are running late again.
result.ponchtml: Tá moill ar na busanna arísThe buses are running late again.

result.html: Tá moill bheag ormI'm running late a little.
result.ponchtml: Tá moill ḃeag ormI'm running late a little.

result.html: Tá mé i mbun gnóI am running a business.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mbun gnóI am running a business.

result.eng: She is running in general elections.
result.ga: Tá sí ag seasamh san olltoghchán
result.orig: Tá sí ag seasamh san olltoghchán
result.html: Tá sí ag seasamh san olltoghchánShe is running in general elections.
result.ponchtml: Tá sí ag seasaṁ san olltoġċánShe is running in general elections.

result.html: Téim ag rithI go running.
result.ponchtml: Téim ag riṫI go running.

result.eng: I go running and swimming every day.
result.ga: Téim ag rith agus ag snámh gach lá
result.orig: Téim ag rith agus ag snámh gach lá
result.html: Téim ag rith agus ag snámh gach láI go running and swimming every day.
result.ponchtml: Téim ag riṫ agus ag snáṁ gaċ láI go running and swimming every day.

result.html: Tháinig uisce lena súileHer eyes started running.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig uisce lena súileHer eyes started running.
